CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 25, 1956, page 1, reads: "Discussing Integration - Mrs. Veronica B. Hill of New Orleans, La., shows the minority report on integration which she read at the Tuesday meeting of the American Federation of Teachers, to Carl J. Megal, president of the Federation, while Hal Wood, Anderson, Ind.; W. P. Swan, Gary, Ind.; Herrick S. Roth, Denver, Colo., and F. Earl McGinnes Jr., look on. The Federation is meeting at the Penn-Sheraton Hotel - 'Teenie' Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of woman and five men, left to right: Hal Wood, W. P. Swan, Veronica B. Hill, Carl J. Megal holding documents, Herrick S. Roth, and F. Earl McGinnes Jr., some wearing American Federation of Teachers name tags, posed in ballroom of Penn Sheraton Hotel
